1: A bet on which team will win the match. Options are usually: home team, draw, or away team.
2: A simplified bet on which team will win, excluding the possibility of a draw. Options are only the home team or the away team.
3: A bet on which team will win only the second half of the game, regardless of the final match outcome.
4: A bet that applies an advantage or disadvantage (handicap) to one team to balance the odds, typically useful when one team is strongly favored.
5: A bet on whether the total number of goals scored by both teams will be over or under a set value, such as 2.5 goals.
6: A bet on the total goals in the first half only, predicting if it will be over or under a specified number.
7: A double bet combining the outcome of the first half (HT) and the full match result (FT).
8: A bet on whether both teams will score at least one goal during the match, regardless of the final result.
9: A bet where the final result is modified by a predefined handicap applied to one team, leveling the playing field.
10: A bet predicting the exact scoreline of the match, such as 2-1 or 1-0.
11: A bet to predict which half will have the most goals scored: first half, second half, or equal scoring in both halves.
12: A safer bet allowing you to choose two of the three possible outcomes: home win or draw, away win or draw, or home or away win.
13: A bet on which team will be leading at the end of the first half, regardless of the full match result.
14: A bet on which team will score the first goal of the match.
15: A bet on which team will score the last goal before the match ends.
16: A bet predicting the total number of goals scored by the home team during the match.
17: A bet predicting the total number of goals scored by the away team during the match.
18: A bet on the first half result, modified by a handicap applied to one team.
19: An Asian handicap bet that applies only to the first half of the match.
20: A double chance bet applied only to the first half, allowing two possible outcomes for safety.
21: A bet on whether the total number of goals in the match will be an odd or even number.
22: A bet on whether the total number of goals in the first half will be odd or even.
